name: Space Invaders (itch) (Karl Fayeton)
description:
SPACE INVADERS 2020 A classic arcade game remade in Unity!

You have to kill all the aliens before they reach Earth. You have 3 spare spaceships in case of accident.

CONTROLS

Move spaceship : ←→ keys or 🖱

Shoot missile : Space or Left Click

USELESS CONTROLS

J : Remove juiciness (for game designers)

M : Disable Mouse controls
